LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_ClearAPIConfigConfirm:
Are you sure you want to clear all API configuration and cache?

This will:
- Clear independent API Key, URL, Model
- Clear all AI summary caches
- Reset AI service state

You will need to reconfigure API to use AI summarization.
LanguageData.RimTalk_Settings_ClearAPIConfigWarning: After clearing, you need to re-enter API Key to use AI summarization

LanguageData.RimTalk_MindStream_GuideContent:
=== Mind Stream Operation Guide ===
【Select Memories】 • Click: Select single memory • Ctrl+Click: Multi-select/Deselect • Shift+Click: Range selection • Drag to select: Batch selection
【Batch Operations】 • Summarize: Summarize SCM memories to ELS • Archive: Archive ELS memories to CLPA • Delete: Delete selected memories
【Right-click Features】 • Right-click on ELS/CLPA checkbox to create new memory
【Layer Descriptions】 • ABM (Blue): Ultra short-term memory • SCM (Green): Short-term memory • ELS (Yellow): Event log • CLPA (Purple): Long-term archive
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_Desc: Customize prompt templates used when AI summarizes memories
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_ResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset to default prompts?
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_DailySummaryDesc: Used for SCM → ELS daily summarization (~20 memories)
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_DeepArchiveDesc: Used for ELS → CLPA deep archiving (~15 memories)
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_MaxTokensDesc: Controls maximum length of AI-generated summaries
LanguageData.RimTalk_PromptEditor_Tip3: • Very large values increase API costs
LanguageData.RimTalk_Preview_NoMemoryComp: Selected pawn has no memory component
LanguageData.RimTalk_Preview_NoContext: [No Context, please trigger a dialogue first]
LanguageData.RimTalk_Preview_HelpContent:
=== Injection Previewer Help ===
【Overview】 This tool previews memory and knowledge injection effects, helping you understand what information will be used during AI conversations.
【Knowledge Injection】 • Matching Sources: Select variables used for knowledge matching • [P] prefix indicates Pawn property variables (will parse all participants) • Parsed match text is used to keyword-match against the knowledge library • Match results are sorted by score
【Memory Injection】 • ABM: Ultra short-term dialogue memory (complete conversation rounds) • SCM: Short-term memory (deprecated, now summarizes directly to ELS) • ELS: Event Log Storage (AI-summarized memories) • CLPA: Long-term Archive (important event archives)
【How to Use】 1. Select current pawn (required) 2. Optional: Select target pawn (simulates conversation) 3. Check the matching sources you need 4. Click "Refresh Preview" to see results
【Tips】 • Matching source settings sync to global settings • Pawn property variables only need pawn info to parse • Environment variables require map information • Other variables require at least one generated conversation to parse
